articles.description: England face a battle to level the Ashes after Australia enjoy the better of the first day of the fifth Test at The Oval.

articles.description: Jordan Henderson has joined Saudi Arabian side Al-Ettifaq, but in doing so much of the LGBTQ+ community has been left disappointed in him.
articles.title: Henderson's Saudi move has 'tarnished reputation'
